channel.title: Writeups on gentlemen | CTFteam
channel.description: Recent content in Writeups on gentlemen | CTFteam

item.title: JadeCTF2022 ++Game
item.description: ++game is a web challenge that was part of the 2022 Jade CTF. In order to get the flag, we had to beat an impossible game. Overview After registering, the game greets us with our current score and a button to increase it. Each time we click the button, the score is increased by 1. To protect itself from automated requests, a valid reCAPTCHA token is required to increase the score.

item.title: JadeCTF2022 BitSetGo
item.description: Bit Set Go is a reversing challenge that was part of the 2022 Jade CTF. We were given a binary and its output, and had to find the flag. Overview output consists of 41 seemingly random bytes: 0206541B 175B135B 17375C17 0C3A5C11 37510409 15125C16 370B5811 370D550F 1E2E312B 000C0402 37 bitsetgo is a 64-bit ELF go binary containing debug symbols. By running it, we see that it reads the two files flag.txt and key.
